#### Read indata
```{r}
setwd(dir.indata)
in_p4c_cytof <- fread("in_donovan2024_p4c_cytof_cluster_pct.csv.gz")

head(in_p4c_cytof)
```

#### Prepare ai_p4c_cytof
```{r}
ai_p4c_cytof <- in_p4c_cytof %>%
  dplyr::rename(CyTOF_cell_population = Cell_cluster_name) %>%
  select(LabID, CyTOF_cell_population, Units, Value) %>%
  unique();

setwd(dir.aidata)
fwrite(ai_p4c_cytof, "ai_p4c_cytof.csv.gz")
```
